title: Fortress of the Wizard
description: Fortress of the Wizard is a magical defense adventure where you become a mighty sorcerer guarding your stronghold from relentless demon hordes. Harness an arsenal of devastating spells—fireballs, icy waves, swirling tornadoes, meteors, and more—to crush the invasion. Every battle tests your timing, strategy, and mastery of the arcane arts as you fight to protect your realm.
